_comment: Sample configuration file for chess neural network training
_description: This config uses the 'medium' preset with all default values filled in

model._d_model_comment: Model dimension (embedding size) - should be power of 2
model._nhead_comment: Number of attention heads - must divide d_model
model._input_channels_comment: Number of input feature planes (8x8x18 board representation)

training._val_split_comment: Fraction of data to use for validation (0.0 to 1.0)
training._early_stopping_patience_comment: Stop training if no improvement for N epochs

data._num_workers_comment: Number of worker processes for data loading
data._pin_memory_comment: Pin memory for faster GPU transfer
data._max_positions_comment: Maximum number of positions to load (null for all)

paths._comment: File paths (set these when using the config)
paths._data_file_comment: Path to training data file (.zst format)
